  • Method Details

    • addUser

      public void addUser(String ID, String firstName, String lastName) throws ServiceException
      Adds a new user
      Parameters:
      ID - - String which describes the ID must be convertable to Long
      firstName - - String which describes the first name
      lastName - - String which describes the second name
      Throws:
      ServiceException - if a user with the same ID already exists or if the ID is invalid or if the User is invalid

    • deleteUser

      public void deleteUser(String strID) throws ServiceException
      Deletes a user
      Parameters:
      strID - - String which describes the ID must be convertable to Long
      Throws:
      ServiceException - if the ID cannot be converted to Long or if the ID is invalid or if no user with that ID exists

    • addFriendship

      public void addFriendship(String strID1, String strID2) throws ServiceException
      Parameters:
      strID1 - - String which describes the ID of the first user
      strID2 - - String which describes the ID of the second user
      Throws:
      ServiceException - if the friendship already exists if the IDs are not valid

    • deleteFriendship

      public void deleteFriendship(String strID1, String strID2) throws ServiceException
      Removes a friendship
      Parameters:
      strID1 - - String which describes the ID of the first user
      strID2 - - String which describes the ID of the second user
      Throws:
      ServiceException - if the IDs are not valid if the friendship does not exist

    • getAll

      public Iterable<User> getAll()
      Finds the list of users
      Returns:
      Iterable of Users

      public List<User> getMostSociableCommunity()
      Finds the most sociable community
      Returns:

      public int getNumberOfGroups()
      Finds the number of groups inside the community

    • findUser

      public User findUser(Long ID)
      Finds a User based on its ID
      Parameters:
      ID - - Long which describes the ID
      Returns:
      - User object which coresponds to the ID null if no User with that ID was found
